Channel.title: Family Guys

Channel.title: The Hangover
Channel.description: Three friends embark on a wild and unforgettable trip to Las Vegas for a bachelor party.

Channel.title: Deadpool
Channel.description: A hilarious and action-packed superhero film featuring the irreverent anti-hero, Deadpool.

Channel.title: Superbad
Channel.description: Two high school friends embark on a wild night of adventure and misadventure before their graduation.

Channel.title: Breaking Bad
Channel.description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine manufacturer navigates the criminal underworld.

Channel.title: The Shawshank Redemption
Channel.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

Channel.title: The Godfather
Channel.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

Channel.title: Forrest Gump
Channel.description: A man with a low IQ embarks on an extraordinary journey through decades of American history.

Channel.title: Avengers: Infinity War
Channel.description: The Avengers team up to stop the villainous Thanos from collecting all the Infinity Stones and wiping out half of all life in the universe.

Channel.title: The Dark Knight
Channel.description: Batman faces off against the Joker in a battle for Gotham City's soul.

Channel.title: Inception
Channel.description: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal their secrets is offered a chance to have his criminal history erased.

Channel.title: Die Hard
Channel.description: New York City cop John McClane battles a group of terrorists who have taken hostages in a Los Angeles skyscraper.

Channel.title: Jurassic Park
Channel.description: Dinosaurs are brought back to life through genetic engineering, but things go horribly wrong when the creatures escape.

Channel.title: The Matrix
Channel.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

Channel.title: The Lion King
Channel.description: A young lion prince flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.

Channel.title: Toy Story
Channel.description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

Channel.title: Finding Nemo
Channel.description: A clownfish embarks on a journey to rescue his son who has been captured in the Great Barrier Reef.

Channel.title: Shrek
Channel.description: An ogre and his new friend embark on a quest to rescue a princess and reclaim the land the villainous Lord Farquaad has seized.

Channel.title: Jaws
Channel.description: A giant great white shark arrives on the shores of a New England beach resort and wreaks havoc with bloody attacks on swimmers.

Channel.title: The Exorcist
Channel.description: When a teenage girl is possessed by a mysterious entity, her mother seeks the help of two priests to save her daughter.

Channel.title: Psycho
Channel.description: A secretary embezzles money and flees to a remote motel run by a disturbed proprietor.

Channel.title: The Shining
Channel.description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil and spiritual presence influences the father into violence.

Channel.title: The Conjuring
Channel.description: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.

Channel.title: Halloween
Channel.description: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween night, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield to kill again.

Channel.title: Game of Thrones
Channel.description: Noble families vie for control of the Iron Throne in the Seven Kingdoms of Westeros.

Channel.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
Channel.description: A young hobbit, Frodo Baggins, embarks on a perilous quest to destroy the One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

Channel.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Channel.description: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family, and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.

Channel.title: Pan's Labyrinth
Channel.description: In the falangist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.

Channel.title: Star Wars: A New Hope
Channel.description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee, and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying Death Star.

Channel.title: The Terminator
Channel.description: A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation.

Channel.title: Blade Runner
Channel.description: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space, and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

Channel.title: Inception
Channel.description: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal their secrets is offered a chance to have his criminal history erased.

Channel.title: The Martian
Channel.description: An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team assumes him dead, and must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive.

Channel.title: The Fifth Element
Channel.description: In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr. Zorg at bay.
